snippet.title: Structural Engineer (NZ Experience)
snippet.description: A structural engineer either contract or permanent is sought to join this medium sized multi-disciplinary consultancy in central London for their buildings design division. The firm have close links with a prominent New Zealand firm and they have worked together on many projects both in the UK and NZ.
